Kusalattika, Cūḷantaraduka
Kusalattika, Lokiyaduka
Lokiyapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccanīya
Nahetu
32.
1181Akusalaṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo lokiyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (1)
1182Abyākataṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato lokiyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
33.
1183Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava…pe…  novigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi…pe…  sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
